client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

transfer_id.title: TransferID
transfer_id.description: The ID of the transfer to refund.

amount.title: TransferRefundAmount
amount.description: The amount of the refund (decimal string with two digits of precision e.g. "10.00").

idempotency_key.title: TransferRefundIdempotencyKey
idempotency_key.description:
A random key provided by the client, per unique refund. Maximum of 50 characters.

The API supports idempotency for safely retrying requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. For example, if a request to create a refund fails due to a network connection error, you can retry the request with the same idempotency key to guarantee that only a single refund is created.
